references.paper_title: Membership inference attacks against machine learning models
references.reason: This foundational paper introduced the concept of membership inference attacks, which are central to the current work.

references.paper_title: Membership inference attacks from first principles
references.reason: This paper provides a rigorous theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing membership inference attacks, which is relevant to the paper's methodology.
This paper addressed label-only membership inference attacks, a particularly challenging setting that is the focus of the current work.
This paper also focuses on label-only membership inference attacks and provides a benchmark against which the current work's performance can be compared.
This highly influential paper introduced adversarial examples and laid the groundwork for the transfer-based adversarial attacks employed in the current work.
